Windlord::

"It will be easy"said the male while he sit down near her and he 
touched kindly his cheek"My happines is make her happy... Why don't 
we start a plan to get back Malice while she rest?"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Megatron Revived:
>  
> The Emperor clone watched Windlord.  The action brought a kind 
smie to his face, something rarely ever seen.  He laughed heartily, 
he was begining to like the Maximal.
> "You have a square on your shoulders. I respect that.  You just 
make sure she is happy, or else!" he said, mostly as a joke.
